name: Radiant
description: Radiant damage, dealt by a Cleric's Flame Strike spell or an angel's smiting weapon, sears the flesh like fire and overloads the spirit with power. Radiant damage represents divine and holy energy.
resistanceNotes: Fiends and undead are often vulnerable to or specially affected by Radiant damage. Some undead cannot regenerate hit points when damaged by Radiant sources.
